Text: thanks, i'm going to continue seeding this one and the rest i've downloaded for the rest of the week. Also, even though you say "NOT for handhelds or phones, just computers." it looks great on my ipod touch an doesn't need conversion.

P.S. I watch my quark(s) on 32" LCD via HDMI from PS3.
No conversion required.
Just start file as normal and [PAUSE] immediately. 
Then open [OSD] and choose [Slow Advance].
A/V quality is about 8+ compared to a normal 20-40 file.
But the compression is unbelievable.
